pageTitle: Re: Thoughts on animation scripting language
textBeforeTable: Facebook Tweet RSS Quote Reply Anyhow if anyone has additional suggestions for api functions/functionality I'm open to suggestions. I'm also thinking to add a matrixstack object, so you could use that similar to the OpenGL intermediate mode. end end grp1:setOri(ori); ori:mulRotateAB(angle1, 1, 0, 0); local ori=ldc.matrix(); --single rotating group test else end grp3:setOri(ori); ori:setRotate(angle3, 0, 0, 1); else grp3:setPosOri(mat); mat:mulTranslateAB(pos); pos:scale(-1); mat:mulAB(ori); mat:mulTranslateAB(pos); mat=ldc.matrix(); pos=ldc.vector(90, 40, 70); --rel rotation test (excuse to play more with matrix and vector userdata) if doAltTest then grp2:setOri(ori); ori:setRotate(angle2, 0, 0, 1); grp1:setOri(ori); ori:mulRotateAB(angle1, 0, 0, 1); local ori=ldc.matrix(); print('frame: ',ani:getFrameNr(),', angle1: ',angle1, ', angle2: ', angle2, ', angle3: ', angle3); local angle3=-0.2*angle2+(360/40/2); local angle2=-0.5*angle1+(360/16/2); --full gear rotation test if (grp2:isLinked() and grp3:isLinked()) then local angle1=ani:getFrameNr()/ani:getFrameCnt()*totRotCnt*360; local ani=ldc.animation.getCurrent(); function frameChange() end print('fps: ', ani:getFPS(), ', frameCnt: ',ani:getFrameCnt()); local ani=ldc.animation.getCurrent(); grp3=ldc.group('Group 3'); grp2=ldc.group('Group 2'); grp1=ldc.group('Group 1'); --try to bind upto 3 groups totRotCnt=2; --nr of rotations within the animation length doAltTest=false; --in order to test the matrix class wrapper function play() --Animation functions----- register(); print('apiVersion: ',ldc.getApiVersion()); --ldc.setPrint2Console(true); --ldc.setPrint2Log(true); end myAni:setEvent('play', 'play'); myAni:setEvent('frameChange', 'frameChange'); myAni:setLength(10); --seconds myAni:setFPS(25); myAni=ldc.animation('Test animation 2'); myAni:setEvent('play', 'play'); myAni:setEvent('frameChange', 'frameChange'); myAni:setLength(2); --seconds myAni:setFPS(25); local myAni=ldc.animation('Test animation 1'); function register() --Initialization----     The below lua script is my current test script, everything in
